Author: joppitaa
Text: To stop binging you need to eat and not restrict, be sure to eat at meal times, try not waiting too long in between meals, eat filling foods with a lot of veg and have snacks. Avoid foods that cause you anxiety or make you want to binge and try not feeling like you need to restrict any certain food groups (also try and add things you like to your meals!) and slowly you‚Äôll lose the feeling that you need to binge. Things that also helped me where going to the nutritionist (to re learn how to eat), psychologist, journaling and medication.  I hope you ask for help and find something that works for you, Im sorry if this is not helpful, its just my personal experience. Good luck ‚ù§Ô∏è
